lead_paragraph: Head coach Vern Cotter has injected experience into Scotland's team ahead of their meeting with Georgia at Kilmarnock's Rugby Park on Saturday, making five changes to the starting lineup that beat Argentina at Murrayfield last weekend.

headline.print_headline: Cotter Opts for Experience Against Georgia
headline.main: Cotter Opts for Experience Against Georgia

snippet: Head coach Vern Cotter has injected experience into Scotland's team ahead of their meeting with Georgia at Kilmarnock's Rugby Park on Saturday, making five changes to the starting lineup that beat Argentina at Murrayfield last weekend....
